originalText.text: Dr. Loraine is the best PT I’ve ever met! The experience is great and every session is one on one. I can see the improvement after a few sessions with Loraine. I really appreciate Loraine’s professionalism and skills. She’s also very empathetic to patients. Loraine always have great energy, I enjoyed every PT session with her

text.text: Dr. Loraine is the best PT I’ve ever met! The experience is great and every session is one on one. I can see the improvement after a few sessions with Loraine. I really appreciate Loraine’s professionalism and skills. She’s also very empathetic to patients. Loraine always have great energy, I enjoyed every PT session with her

originalText.text: Dr. Lorriane Antoine started treating me from summer ‘23 due to an ankle injury. She came recommend for a NYU ortho surgeon.  Let me just say she’s amazing! Since the injury happened roughly 10 years ago, I wasn’t sure if anyone could help but she quickly diagnosed the issue and realized the ligaments/muscles were weak. Running up and down the subway has become a breeze! She explains what she is about to do and those massages Oh My Goodness! She really works those muscles. Her space is clean, organized and has all sorts of equipments. If you’re looking for a PT, esp in FiDi, no need to look further, she’s amazing! Plus it doesn’t hurt that quite a few of my Partners see her! Go to Revolution PT and ask for Dr. Antoine!

originalText.text: I had major surgery on my knee the winter of 2020 and signed up for my therapy sessions once approved by my surgeon in January 2021. Dr. Loraine Antoine... she is amazing! She provided A Plus physical therapy and worked me through the most grueling process of my life. Such an amazing set of PT sessions that even on my follow-ups with my surgeon the doctors were in disbelief of the on-going progress I made. The time and dedication that she applies to her patients is unmatched. I recommend everyone I know in need of PT to this office. A true blessing to me. Thank you, Revolution Physical Therapy!!!

originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of being cared for by Dr. Loraine Antoine twice over the years. Each time, Dr. Antoine not only support and worked to heal my injury but her empathetic approach made the experience a great one. I appreciate her professionalism and her passion for what she does. Lorraine has helped me on numerous level, she made me feel like the power to be better is always there, its just up to me to get it.

During our sessions, Lorraine was always encouraging and compassionate and made sure that I was pushing myself during each session in an encouraging way.  Her dedication to her patients is what sets her apart from other Physical Therapist that I have encountered. Her goal is only to make sure you are stronger than when you came in.

Revolution Physical Therapy is not like other Physical Therapy locations. The experience is personable and your sessions are one on one. I would highly recommend Revolution Physical Therapy NYC.

originalText.text: I saw Dr Loraine Antoine for a hand injury. I strained my wrist lifting a heavy suitcase. I had severe pain in my hand and could not hold a fork to eat. I called Dr Loraine and I was able to get an appointment within that same week. She was professional and caring. I began to feel better after just the first visit. She gave me exercises to do while at home which helped as well. Dr Loraine is who I send all my friends and family to when they need physical therapy.
